Bash(venvScriptspython.exe -c "
from core.generation.fact_generator import FactGenerator
import polars as pl

fg = FactGenerator\(\)

# Test with empty dimensions
result = fg.generate_from_type\(
    fact_type=''sales'',
    dimensions={},
    row_count=5
\)

if result[''success'']:
    print\(''SUCCESS!''\)
    print\(''Columns:'', result[''columns'']\)
    print\(\)
    print\(''Sample data:''\)
    for row in result[''sample_data'']:
        print\(row\)
else:
    print\(''ERROR:'', result.get\(''error''\)\)
")
